definition: abbr. for 國民大會|国民大会, National Assembly of the Republic of China (extant during various periods between 1913 and 2005)/abbr. for 新加坡國立大學|新加坡国立大学, National University of Singapore (NUS)/abbr. for 印度國民大會黨|印度国民大会党, Indian National Congress (INC)/abbr. for 馬來西亞印度國民大會黨|马来西亚印度国民大会党, Malaysian Indian Congress (MIC)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
African National Congress, ANC/abbr. for 非洲人國民大會|非洲人国民大会[Fei1 zhou1 ren2 guo2 min2 da4 hui4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Da4 Bai3 ke1 Quan2 shu1 Chu1 ban3 she4
containing_words.word: 中國大百科全書出版社

definition: Tokyo Imperial University (renamed Tokyo University after 1945)
pinyin: Dong1 jing1 Di4 guo2 Da4 xue2
Niu3 yue1 Di4 guo2 Da4 sha4

sentences.english: Several methods are taken in US universities to stop students' plagiarizing on line.
sentences.chinese: 美國大學採取好幾種方法來阻止學生在網絡上面抄襲。

sentences.english: Diagnostic test set by an English university for first year students.
sentences.chinese: 一所英國大學爲第一年學生所設的摸底測試。

sentences.english: The U. S. embassy, meanwhile, was in damage-control mode.
sentences.chinese: 美國大使館，同時，是在損害控制模式。

sentences.english: You may apply for VIP card for free.
sentences.chinese: 您可以申請國大藥房會員卡，會員卡是免費的。

sentences.english: Her songs were spread about the streets in the mainland of the country.
sentences.chinese: 她的歌傳遍祖國大陸的大街小巷。

sentences.english: Degree classification has a long history in our universities.
sentences.chinese: 學位分級制度在英國大學中擁有悠久的歷史。

sentences.english: Few papers on the college-teacher appointment in early modern China have been published.
sentences.chinese: 關於近代中國大學教師的聘任問題，鮮有專論。

sentences.english: Jianxun Liu, Hunan University of Science and Technology, China.
sentences.chinese: 建勳劉，湖南科學技術，中國大學。

sentences.english: Congress taught us only vote back politics… it did nothing to this nation.
sentences.chinese: 國大黨教我們的盡是票倉政治。

sentences.english: I went to the Chinese Ambassy to apply for a visa.
sentences.chinese: 我去中國大使館辦簽證了。

sentences.english: I was there when the ceremony (of the Founding of the PRC)going.
sentences.chinese: 我能參加開國大典那真是十分榮幸。

sentences.english: University size is based on the total number of students enrolled.
sentences.chinese: 美國大學的規模大小取決於總體錄取的學生人數。

sentences.english: He was the first Chinese ever to have graduated from an American university.
sentences.chinese: 容閎是第一個畢業於美國大學的中國留學生。

sentences.english: Excuse me , Could you tell me the way to the Empery edifice?
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，先生。請問帝國大廈怎麼走？

sentences.english: Kai Guo Da Dian is a documentary.

sentences.chinese: 他們在美國大使館安裝竊聽器。

definition: variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
